title: BattleLan, Enables Multiplayer in all games
description:
With this little handy program, you can play any game you want, using the lan connection in the game.

- Hoster -
1. Insert the ip's to the other players and click add
2. Click &quot;Start&quot; and run any game of your choice
3. When you're in the game, host a lan game.
4. Play

- Player -
1. Insert host ip, click add
2. Click &quot;start&quot; and run the game
3. &quot;Find lan games&quot; join the server that pop up
4. Play
